eh.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it
eh.translation[0].definitions[0].example: Eh? She’s got how many children?
eh.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: used when you want someone to reply to you or agree with something you have said
eh.translation[0].definitions[1].example: Maybe teenagers aren’t as clueless as everyone thought, eh?
eh.translation[0].definitions[2].definit: used when you are surprised by something that someone has said
